price: あなたの主*からのご恩寵ゆえに。それこそは偉大なる勝利。
arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbika dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
